trends: There have been 9 other sightings in San Angelo
There were no other sightings in San Angelo on or around May 31st 2010
divs: sighting detailssitting on my back patio having a smoke and looking at the stars. noticed a very bright object coming from the ssw heading nne. i noticed it just over the tree tops near the horizon. it was realy moving !i thought it was lifeflight coming into the hospital nearby.it way faster than a jet or satellite. i know this due to the fact i watch them nightly. it was very high and made no noise(it was very quiet out)i went in the house to get my phone and call my cousin in abilene some 90 miles away. getting the phone ,calling and connecting took maybe 90 sec. by the time he answered and went outside said object was heading out of his sight nne.post script: i see high aircraft\ satellites nightly and this was far far brighter and faster than any i have ever wittnessed. i have been a sky watcher for 30+ yrs and this was by no way a meteorite\plane\satellite .
